home.title: o-kitchen
home.subtitle: / Decentralized
home.description: o-kitchen is a nonprofit decentralized social platform for fanworks powered by open-source blockchain protocol. Protecting freedom of creativity and publishing rights for fanart creators.

detail.platformDescription: A nonprofit decentralized social platform for fanworks
detail.protocolDescription: Powered by open-source blockchain protocol, protecting creative freedom and publishing rights for fanart creators

antiCensorship.title: Censorship Protection
antiCensorship.description: Decentralized storage based on blockchain technology ensures your creative content cannot be arbitrarily deleted or censored, truly guaranteeing creative freedom.

dataProof.title: Onchain Proof
dataProof.description: When users publish content, the system automatically generates on-chain proof for that data, recording publication timestamps and data summaries.

decentralized.title: Decentralized
decentralized.description: A decentralized community governed jointly by creators and users, where everyone has a voice in determining the community's development direction.

poweredByLove.title: Powered by Love
poweredByLove.description: Supporting pure creative passion, allowing creators to focus on content they love without commercial constraints.

coinExchange.title: Coin Exchange
coinExchange.description: Fair anonymous stablecoin exchange mechanism ensuring quality creations receive deserved rewards and recognition, building a sustainable creative ecosystem.

anonymousCommunity.title: Anonymous Community
anonymousCommunity.description: Encrypted login protects privacy identity, building an anonymous and free creative community, making cultural exchange more secure.

techStack.title: Technical Architecture
techStack.subtitle: Modern platform built on the latest Web3 technology stack

lens.title: Lens Protocol
lens.description: Decentralized social protocol building an open social graph

grove.title: Grove Storage
grove.description: Distributed content storage ensuring long-term data preservation

wallet.title: Family Wallet
wallet.description: Secure and convenient wallet connection experience

nextjs.title: Next.js
nextjs.description: Modern web framework for ultimate user experience

roadmap.title: Development Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Building a complete decentralized creative ecosystem in phases

cta.title: Join o-kitchen Community
cta.subtitle: Create freely with global creators in a decentralized harbor

chips.title: Onchain Proof System
chips.subtitle: Onchain Proof
chips.description: A blockchain-based storage system that provides immutable ownership proof for every content

step1.title: Data Submission
step1.description: When users publish content, the system automatically generates on-chain proof for that data, recording publication timestamps and data summaries

step2.title: Blockchain Record
step2.description: The unique ID, timestamp, and data summary of the on-chain proof are long-term recorded on the blockchain, ensuring publication records cannot be tampered with

step3.title: Public Verification
step3.description: Anyone can view and verify on-chain proofs, ensuring transparency and integrity of published data

antiCounterfeit.title: Anti-Counterfeit Protection
antiCounterfeit.description: Blockchain technology ensures proofs cannot be forged or tampered with

uniqueId.title: Unique Identifier
uniqueId.description: Each proof has a unique ID for easy tracking and verification

transparency.title: Public Transparency
transparency.description: Everyone can view and verify the authenticity of proofs

permanentStorage.title: Long-term Storage
permanentStorage.description: Proof information is long-term stored and will not be lost or damaged

brand.description: A safe harbor for fandoms, protecting freedom of creativity and publishing rights for fanart creators.

footer.copyright: © 2025 o-kitchen. Built with ❤️ for the decentralized fanart networks.
